body:
Hi mostapha. Which kinds of CFD modellings are included in this version? I'm looking for a means of modelling vertical temperature distributions in large atria.
My idea was to cheat, using simple Honeybee tools (vertically dividing the big zone into sub-zones with 'air walls'), but the 'air wall' feature does not seem to allow direct solar radiation and air flow, thus this work-around does not seem to do the job. So it seems I have to go on to CFD modelling. Can this tool comprehent heat flows - maybe translated into wind speeds due to this flow - or does it only model urban wind flows? Thanks - Hamborg
